lines.text:
[singing and forgetting the words]
There was a farmer had a pig, and Piggo was his name-o...
Uh, Beth, I have a call about a dancing-job on a cruise-ship, so I'm gonna take it in Dunlap's office. Can you watch the lines?
Sure, that's great Marge! Where's this ship going?
I just wanted to be friends...
You made me work at that place for 11 years! WHY? We had the money! I HOPE YOU ROT IN HELL!

[after killing her]
Time to go, mama.
